name: What the duck ?!
description:
Use Arrow Keys to move 

Press X to Confirm

Press C to Cancel

Press Enter to pause the game or Restart the Level

Can you help Ducky find his way back home through the forest? On your way, you’ll face many traps and obstacles — maybe too many! 

You’ll need to collect the items along the way if you want to make it to the next level. Find food for your friend Pinky or she won’t let you pass either! But worry not, Twitter the blue duck is here to help you on your journey. 

The clock's ticking.. How fast can you make it home safe  & sound?

  Pixel Art by Marion Abélanet & Shyfu  

Cover by Léa Nguyen & Marion Abélanet

Big thanks to Arthur, Benjamin, Jérémie, Léa, Marion, Raphaël, Zefyr & Zelo and Christian Majewsky
